page.title: 07MOTORWAY POLICE
page.content: There are 20 people stationed in Cullompton in this force.Most of their time is spent watching for speeding motorists and drunk_driving.If they are informed by Exeter that a car has been stolen or a crime committed they watch the motorway from bridges or observation points.They are called to accidents and carry first_aid kits.Motorway telephones are one mile apart.If it is a minor crash and no_one is hurt they put you in touch with motor organisations.There are numbered posts along the motorway and arrows to the nearest phone box.When the police know the numbers they can arrive more quickly. They work in cars,Range_Rovers and on motor cycles.They work eight hour shifts and in pairs.They patrol from{ {Exeter}to{Taunton}using Cullompton's access roads.
